'''3.5.17''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on December 6, 2024.

== Additions ==
* Added new "Editor Mode" tab in Bedrock.
* Added new "Marketplace Pass" tab in Bedrock.

== Changes ==
* Removed "Java vs Bedrock" comparison chart.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCL|fixedin=3.5.17 (Win 10/11)
|;old
|22433|Capes show no texture in edit skin menu when using a right-to-left language
|24212|Minecraft Launcher profiles do not update "LastUsed" data value in json file.
|otherissuescount=3}}
; Other
* Bug fixes to some controls and settings.
* More improvements & fixes to Offline Mode.
* Various other bug fixes and under the hood improvements.</onlyinclude>
